mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.model_id, s.model_name, s.model_sku, s.current_price, s.original_price, s.stock, s.promotion_id, s.item_id, s.status, s.image_id, s.image_url, s.create_time, IFNULL(SUM(d.count), 0) AS salesVolume FROM tb_model AS s LEFT JOIN tb_order_item AS d ON s.model_id = d.model_id WHERE s.item_id = #{item_id} group by s.model_id
